long_description: The Carolina paddling pants from NRS bring a dose of warm, waterproof comfort to the sometimes cold and harsh world you love to explore. Waterproof, breathable fabric shields you from splashes while letting sweat vapor escape to keep you dry and comfortable; taped seams increase water resistance. Adjustable neoprene waistband and adjustable ankle cuffs, both with rip-and-stick tabs, help keep water out. Waterproof stretch panels at hips improve the fit. Handy thigh pocket stores small items. Reinforced seat and Cordura(R) nylon knee patches improve durability in critical areas.
short_description: The Carolina paddling pants from NRS bring a dose of warm, waterproof comfort to the sometimes cold and harsh world you love to explore.
